Description:

Crysis 3 continues the famous series of shooters from Crytek. The game is set in 2047, 
and you have to play the role of prophet. He returned to New York, where he learns that 
the city is under a dome Nanodome, which was established corporation CELL Residents 
report that Nanodome necessary for their protection and cleaning of the last tsefov metropolis, 
but, in fact, it is part of the construction covert operation to capture technologies for world 
domination. Wearing improved Nanosuit and armed with deadly bow and destructive alien 
technology, Prophet will prevent the insidious plans CELL and destroy the remaining aliens.
